text.section:
Party affiliation changes or changes to or from a decline:
shall be processed at any time that registration is open; and
except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, may not be processed when registration is closed.

If a local board receives a request for a party affiliation change after the close of registration, the local board shall make the change and it shall become effective for the next election provided:
there is sufficient evidence, as determined by the local boards pursuant to regulations adopted by the State Board, that the request was mailed on or before the close of registration for that election; or
the request was submitted by the voter to the Motor Vehicle Administration, a voter registration agency, another local board, or the State Board on or before the close of registration for that election.
